thread.title: BRIEF-Energold Drilling Announces $9 Mln Of New Infrastructure Drilling Contracts In Canada

title: BRIEF-Energold Drilling Announces $9 Mln Of New Infrastructure Drilling Contracts In Canada

organizations.name: drilling contracts in canada reuters staff    energold drilling corp

text:
March 29, 2018 / 1:06 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Energold Drilling Announces $9 Mln Of New Infrastructure Drilling Contracts In Canada Reuters Staff 
  Energold Drilling Corp: 
* ENERGOLD DRILLING CORP. ANNOUNCES $9 MILLION OF NEW INFRASTRUCTURE DRILLING CONTRACTS IN CANADA 
* ENERGOLD DRILLING CORP - ‍IT HAS RECENTLY BEEN AWARDED $9 MILLION IN NEW INFRASTRUCTURE DRILLING CONTRACTS IN CANADA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
